Trade/Device Name(s): StatStrip Xpress Glucose Hospital Meter System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for StatStrip Xpress Glucose Hospital Meter System for point-of-care glucose determination in whole blood specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for point-of-care, in vitro quantitative determination of glucose in capillary finger stick, venous whole blood, arterial whole blood, neonate arterial whole blood, and neonate heel stick specimens in hospital and professional healthcare settings; not intended for use with neonate cord blood specimens or for diabetes screening/diagnosis.
